title: Moon Cake
description: The round, golden-brown pastry of a Chinese mooncake, a traditional delicacy and lunar symbol of the Mid-Autumn Festival. Many platforms feature a design or character imprinted on the crust, and depict a slice cut out to show a brown paste with a duck egg yolk inside. Twitter displays the Chinese character for “fall/autumn” or “harvest” (Áßã) on top.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the moon cake emoji is presented as a delectable, circular pastry with intricate patterns pressed into its golden-brown surface. Apple‚Äôs realistic lighting and glossy finish make the textured details pop, hinting at a rich, savory or sweet filling within. This emoji evokes the traditions of the Mid-Autumn Festival, symbolizing family reunion, prosperity, and good fortune, often shared during autumn celebrations.
